info.name: finan_60_verify_to_create_new_transaction_via_qr
info.description:
Testsuite: Verify to create new transaction via bank account (QR)

Testcase:

1. Login with owner account
2. Get data
    1. account coa / get list account
    2. account bank / get list bank account
    3. invoice / get list invoice => get invoice had payment_account_id & un_paid/partital_paid status
    4. invoice / get invoice detail => update more data for invoice at 2.c.
    5. Posting / Get list posting => get total posting
    6. Report / Get report cash_flow => has change with tnx (confirm with PO)
    7. Report / Get report account => get data
    8. Report / Get report account receivable paid => get data
    9. Report / Get report account receivable unpaid => get data
    10. Report / Get report account receivable customer => get data respective with invoice at 2.c.
    11. Report / Get report account receivable invoice => get data respective with 2.c
    12. \[New\] payment / get list payment => get total
    13. Transaction / Get list transaction => get total transaction
3. Create transaction
    1. payment / gen buyer payment QR
    2. hook / pay for this QR
4. Check data
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => have new record
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly
    3. \[New\] payment / get list payment => increase 1
    4. \[New\] payment / get payment detail => data correctly
    5. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => check respective banlance_amount
    6. Invoice / Get list invoice => check invoice status at 2.c
    7. Invoice / Get invoice detail => update data
    8. Posting / get list posting => have 2 new posting (account receivable & account debit)
    9. Report / Get report cash_flow => update data
    10. Report / Get report account => update data
    11. Report / Get report account receivable paid => update data
    12. Report / Get report account receivable unpaid => update data
    13. Report / Get report account receivable customer => update data
    14. Report / Get report account receivable invoice => update data

Note:

- Không cần call HOOK, server sẽ tự động hook sau 10s để payment sau khi gen QR
